name: Mrbomberman
body:
### MrBomberman.
Welcome to the official page of MrBomberman!

### Project Features
Includes the Game Client, the Universal MServer and the powerfull MWorld Editor.

### TODO list
Client:
- [Done] Authentification, Lobby, Chat
- Game creation interface
- Game lobby
- Game Interface
- Map loading

MServer:
- [Done] Hashtable serialization
- [Done] Game Rooms
- IA management

MWorld Editor
- [Done] Creating/Saving/Loading maps
- [Done] Map sculpting tool
- [Done] Texture/Color paint
- [Done] Fog of War
- Entities editor
- Skills editor
- Items editor

### Authors and Contributors
@MrNothing

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
